item.title: ‘Bones’ Star Emily Deschanel Was a ‘Wreck’ After Being Reprimanded in Season 1 For Being ‘Late and Unprepared’: ‘We Were Working Insane Hours’
item.description: Emily Deschanel’s run on “Bones” almost ended in Season 1 instead of Season 12. In a recent interview on David Duchovny’s “Fail Better” podcast, Deschanel recalled
